title: [DTL] Recruitment Talk
author: 글로벌리더십센터 최여진
content:
Dynamic Technology Lab (DTL) is a quantitative hedge fund established in Singapore and engages in global securities trading with multiple asset classes. Join us! And solve frontier challenges in the ever-changing financial markets. 

Find out more about DTL and our opportunities through our Virtual Recruitment Talk on 5 October 2024 at 12 PM KST. You may register via: https://tinyurl.com/DTL2025
 We have the following full-time openings for our 2025 Global School Recruitment Drive:
Quantitative Researcher
Quantitative Researcher, Machine Learning
Fundamental Quantitative Researcher
Execution Algorithm Researcher
Trading Analyst
We welcome all graduating Bachelor's/Master's/PhD students to apply at https://dytechlab.com/2025recruitment or check out our website at https://www.dytechlab.com/careers/ for other full-time and internship opportunities we have!
